00045 class SIM_API cParImpl : public cNamedObject
00046 {
00047   protected:
00048     // various flags, stored in cNamedObject::flags
00049     enum {
00050       FL_ISVOLATILE = 4,  // whether it was declared as "volatile" in NED
00051       FL_ISEXPR = 8,      // whether it stores a constant or an expression
00052       FL_ISSHARED = 16,   // used by cPar only: whether this object is shared among multiple cPars
00053       FL_CONTAINSVALUE = 32, // whether it has a value
00054       FL_ISSET = 64       // whether the contained value is just a default value (false) or the set value (true)
00055     };
00056 
00057   private:
00058     // unit (s, mW, GHz, baud, etc); optional
00059     const char *unitp; // stringpooled
00060 
00061     // global variables for statistics
00062     static long total_parimpl_objs;
00063     static long live_parimpl_objs;
00064     static cStringPool unitStringPool;
00065 
00066   public:
00067     typedef cPar::Type Type;
00068 
00069   public:
00072 
00076     explicit cParImpl();
00077 
00081     cParImpl(const cParImpl& other);
00082 
00086     virtual ~cParImpl();
00087 
00091     cParImpl& operator=(const cParImpl& otherpar);
00093 
00100     virtual std::string info() const;
00101 
00105     virtual std::string detailedInfo() const;
00106 
00110     virtual cParImpl *dup() const;
00111 
00115     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00116 
00120     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00122 
00128     virtual Type getType() const = 0;
00129 
00133     virtual bool isNumeric() const = 0;
00134 
00138     virtual bool isVolatile() const {return flags & FL_ISVOLATILE;}
00139 
00145     virtual bool isExpression() const {return flags & FL_ISEXPR;}
00146 
00150     virtual bool isShared() const {return flags & FL_ISSHARED;}
00151 
00156     virtual bool containsValue() const  {return flags & FL_CONTAINSVALUE;}
00157 
00163     virtual bool isSet() const {return flags & FL_ISSET;}
00164 
00169     virtual void setIsVolatile(bool f) {setFlag(FL_ISVOLATILE,f);}
00170 
00174     virtual void setIsShared(bool f) {setFlag(FL_ISSHARED,f);}
00175 
00179     virtual void setIsSet(bool f) {setFlag(FL_ISSET,f);}
00180 
00186     virtual const char *getUnit() const;
00187 
00191     virtual void setUnit(const char *s);
00193 
00196 
00200     virtual void setBoolValue(bool b) = 0;
00201 
00205     virtual void setLongValue(long l) = 0;
00206 
00210     virtual void setDoubleValue(double d) = 0;
00211 
00217     virtual void setStringValue(const char *s) = 0;
00218 
00222     virtual void setStringValue(const std::string& s)  {setStringValue(s.c_str());}
00223 
00227     virtual void setXMLValue(cXMLElement *node) = 0;
00228 
00237     virtual void setExpression(cExpression *e) = 0;
00239 
00242 
00246     virtual bool boolValue(cComponent *context) const = 0;
00247 
00251     virtual long longValue(cComponent *context) const = 0;
00252 
00256     virtual double doubleValue(cComponent *context) const = 0;
00257 
00266     virtual const char *stringValue(cComponent *context) const = 0;
00267 
00271     virtual std::string stdstringValue(cComponent *context) const = 0;
00272 
00276     virtual cXMLElement *xmlValue(cComponent *context) const = 0;
00277 
00281     virtual cExpression *getExpression() const = 0;
00283 
00286 
00291     virtual void convertToConst(cComponent *context) = 0;
00292 
00296     virtual bool containsConstSubexpressions() const;
00297 
00302     virtual void evaluateConstSubexpressions(cComponent *context);
00303 
00307     virtual std::string str() const = 0;
00308 
00314     virtual void parse(const char *text) = 0;
00315 
00319     static cParImpl *createWithType(Type type);
00321 
00324 
00329     virtual int compare(const cParImpl *other) const;
00331 
00341     static long getTotalParImplObjectCount() {return total_parimpl_objs;}
00342 
00349     static long getLiveParImplObjectCount() {return live_parimpl_objs;}
00350 
00355     static void resetParImplObjectCounters()  {total_parimpl_objs=live_parimpl_objs=0L;}
00357 };
